data.answer: Synthesized according to the method described by Sobolev et al.

data.question: Is the crystal system of compound 2 trigonal?
data.answer: False, the crystal system of compound 2 is monoclinic.

data.answer: To highlight the 1H atoms in the backbone stemming from the pytpy ligand.

data.question: Did the crystal structure refinement of compound 1 employ anisotropic displacement parameters?

data.answer: False, the 1H NMR background of the 1.3 mm MAS NMR probe was negligible compared to the sample signal.

data.question: What was the method used to assign the peaks of the 1D 1H NMR spectrum?
data.answer: Using homonuclear and heteronuclear 2D correlation experiments.

data.answer: To study the uptake of solvent molecules.
